parameters.jsonBody:
={{ {
  email: $json.email,
  attributes: {
    FIRSTNAME: $json.firstName,
    LASTNAME: $json.lastName,
    STATE: $json.state,
    LAST_EVENT: $json.eventName,
    LAST_EVENT_DATE: $json.eventDate,
    VENUE: $json.venue,
    PLATFORM: $json.platform,
    ORDER_TOTAL: $json.orderTotal,
    TICKET_QUANTITY: $json.ticketQuantity,
    MARKETING_OPT_IN: $json.marketingOptIn
  },
  listIds: $json.listIds,
  updateEnabled: true
} }}
